content: skipped stitches f2tog around post of 2nd of the skipped st and 1st f of the rightcross 1f b2i 5b leftcross in case of crocheting the handle instead of last leftcross skip 1dc in top of first st of the handle working in front of it 1f around post of skipped st if you decide to crochet ch25 now we count this f as the first chain if you are crocheting double_crochet or f on the handle already crochet f2tog instead of this f and the first f on the handle rightcross 6b skip 2 sts 1btr working in front of btr 1f around post of 1st of the 2 skipped stitches f2tog around post of 2nd of the skipped st and 1st f of the rightcross 1f b2i 5b leftcross if you are crocheting the handle already make the next rightcross symmetrical in the same way as the left cross before the handle rightcross 6b skip 2 sts 1btr working in front of btr 1f around post of 1st of the 2 skipped stitches f2tog around post of 2nd of the skipped st and 1st f of the rightcross 1f b2i 5b leftcross rightcross 3b twice join b 138 sts round 43 ch2 4b f2tog around post of next st and second leg of f2tog in the prev round 1f 8b f2tog around post of next st skip around post of next st 1f 8b f2tog around post of next st and second leg of f2tog in the prev round 1f 8b f2tog around post of next st skip around post of next st 1f 8b f2tog around post of next st and second leg of f2tog in the prev round 1f 8b f2tog around post of next st skip around post of next st 1f 4b twice join b 120 sts round 44 ch2 4b 1f around second leg of f2tog in the previous round 1f half_double_crochet into top of same st 1dc into top of same st = v -right crossing 8b v -right crossing 8b twice v -right crossing 8b v -right crossing twice 4b twice join b 144 sts round 45 ch2 3b rightcross leftcross 6b rightcross in case of crocheting the handle instead of last rightcross skip 1dc in top of first st of the handle working behind it 1b around post of skipped st if you decide to crochet ch25 now we count this b as the first chain if you are crocheting double_crochet or f on handles already crochet b and f decrease instead of this b and the first f on the handle leftcross 6b rightcross twice if you are crocheting the handle already make the next leftcross symmetrical in the same way as the rightcross before the handle leftcross 6b rightcross twice leftcross 3b twice join b © tulip bag crochet by svetlana rogatykh 21 round 46 ch2 2b rightcross 2b leftcross 4b rightcross in case of crocheting the handle instead of last rightcross skip 2f 2nd f around 1st
